attributes.action: Kent Freedom Pass Price Increase to £200
attributes.additional_details:
The Kent freedom pass started at £50 a few years ago.

It then increased to £100.
 (People with free school meals could still get it for £50)

KCC have now said that it will go up to £200, but can only be used Monday - Friday between 6AM - 7PM, and not in August (The busy holiday period). Not only is there a price increase but they are removing some of the benefits.

We want to get the price back down to at least £100 with no restrictions in place.
